name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URL that is used to identify this SpecimenDefinition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this SpecimenDefinition is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the SpecimenDefinition. For more information see Technical and Business Versions.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URL that is used to identify this SpecimenDefinition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this SpecimenDefinition is (or will

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A business identifier assigned to this SpecimenDefinition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A business identifier assigned to this SpecimenDefinition.

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the SpecimenDefinition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the SpecimenDefinition author and is not expected to be globally unique.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the SpecimenDefinition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the SpecimenDefinition author and is not expected to be globally uniq

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the SpecimenDefinition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the SpecimenDefinition.

name: $derivedFromCanonical
desc: Returns: The canonical URL pointing to another FHIR-defined SpecimenDefinition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

name: $addderivedFromCanonical
desc: The canonical URL pointing to another FHIR-defined SpecimenDefinition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The canonical URL pointing to another FHIR-defined SpecimenDefinition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

name: $derivedFromUri
desc: Returns: The URL pointing to an externally-defined type of specimen, guideline or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

name: $addderivedFromUri
desc: The URL pointing to an externally-defined type of specimen, guideline or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally-defined type of specimen, guideline or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The current state of theSpecimenDefinition.

name: $experimental
desc: Returns: A flag to indicate that this SpecimenDefinition is not authored for  genuine usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A flag to indicate that this SpecimenDefinition is not authored for  genuine usage.

name: $date
desc: Returns: For draft definitions, indicates the date of initial creation. For active definitions, represents the date of activation. For withdrawn definitions, indicates the date of withdrawal.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: For draft definitions, indicates the date of initial creation. For active definitions, represents the date of activation. For withdrawn definitions, indicates the date of withdrawal.

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: Helps establish the "authority/credibility" of the SpecimenDefinition. May also allow for contact.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Helps establish the "authority/credibility" of the SpecimenDefinition. May also allow for contact.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the SpecimenDefinition from the consumer's perspective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the SpecimenDefinition from the consumer's perspective.

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching of specimen definitions.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching of specimen definitions.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching of specimen definitions.

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A jurisdiction in which the SpecimenDefinition is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A jurisdiction in which the SpecimenDefinition is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A jurisdiction in which the SpecimenDefinition is intended to be used.

name: $purpose
desc: Returns: Explains why this SpecimeDefinition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Explains why this SpecimeDefinition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

name: $copyright
desc: Returns: Copyright statement relating to the SpecimenDefinition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the SpecimenDefinition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Copyright statement relating to the SpecimenDefinition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the SpecimenDefinition.

name: $approvalDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the asset content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the asset content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

name: $lastReviewDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the asset content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after that, but doesn't change the original approval date.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the asset content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after that, but doesn't change the original approval date.

name: $effectivePeriod
desc: Returns: The period during which the SpecimenDefinition content was or is planned to be effective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period during which the SpecimenDefinition content was or is planned to be effective.

name: $typeCollected
desc: Returns: The kind of material to be collected.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The kind of material to be collected.

name: $patientPreparation
desc: Returns: Preparation of the patient for specimen collection.

name: $addpatientPreparation
desc: Preparation of the patient for specimen collection.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Preparation of the patient for specimen collection.

name: $timeAspect
desc: Returns: Time aspect of specimen collection (duration or offset).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Time aspect of specimen collection (duration or offset).

name: $collection
desc: Returns: The action to be performed for collecting the specimen.

name: $addcollection
desc: The action to be performed for collecting the specimen.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The action to be performed for collecting the specimen.

name: $typeTested
desc: Returns: Specimen conditioned in a container as expected by the testing laboratory.

name: $addtypeTested
desc: Specimen conditioned in a container as expected by the testing laboratory.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Specimen conditioned in a container as expected by the testing laboratory.
